results.content: instructor talks about chaining in Section 4. throws code in and does NOT explain how the code works. thoroughly disappointing. Walked away with NO understanding into how chaining works. unfortunately this is is critical to understanding promises. Do not recommend this class. Wasted my money.

results.content: Great explanation of how asynchronous works in javascript. A little more complicated example of using a Promise or Async/Await to fetch some data from a Website would be very useful.
results.content_html: Great explanation of how asynchronous works in javascript. A little more complicated example of using a Promise or Async/Await to fetch some data from a Website would be very useful.
